com.salesforce.androidsdk.security

Class SalesforceKeyGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.security.SalesforceKeyGenerator

  • public class SalesforceKeyGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to generate a unique ID that can be used as an encryption key. The key is derived from an AES-256 base using SecureRandom or AES-128 base using UUID.
    Author:
    bhariharan

      Returns the encryption key being used.
      static java.lang.String getRandom128ByteKey()
      Returns a randomly generated 128-byte key that's URL safe.
      static java.security.PrivateKey getRSAPrivateKey(java.lang.String name, int length)
      Deprecated. 
      Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use KeyStoreWrapper.getRSAPrivateKey(String, int) instead.

      Deprecated. 
      Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use KeyStoreWrapper.getRSAPublicKey(String, int) instead.

      Deprecated. 
      Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use KeyStoreWrapper.getRSAPublicString(String, int) instead.

      Returns the SHA-256 hashed value of the supplied private key.
      static java.lang.String getUniqueId(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the unique ID being used.
      static java.lang.String getUniqueId(java.lang.String name, int length)
      Returns the unique ID being used based on the key length.
      static void upgradeTo7Dot1()
      Upgrades the keys stored in SharedPrefs to encrypted keys.

    • Method Detail

      • getUniqueId

        public static java.lang.String getUniqueId(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the unique ID being used. The default key length is 256 bits.
        Parameters:
        name - Unique name associated with this unique ID.
        Returns:
        Unique ID.

      • getUniqueId

        public static java.lang.String getUniqueId(java.lang.String name,
                                           int length)
        Returns the unique ID being used based on the key length.
        Parameters:
        name - Unique name associated with this unique ID.
        length - Key length.
        Returns:
        Unique ID.

      • getEncryptionKey

        public static java.lang.String getEncryptionKey(java.lang.String name)
        Returns the encryption key being used.
        Parameters:
        name - Unique name associated with this encryption key.
        Returns:
        Encryption key.

      • getRandom128ByteKey

        public static java.lang.String getRandom128ByteKey()
        Returns a randomly generated 128-byte key that's URL safe.
        Returns:
        Random 128-byte key.

      • getSHA256Hash

        public static java.lang.String getSHA256Hash(java.lang.String privateKey)
        Returns the SHA-256 hashed value of the supplied private key.
        Parameters:
        privateKey - Private key.
        Returns:
        SHA-256 hash.

      • getRSAPublicKey

        public static java.security.PublicKey getRSAPublicKey(java.lang.String name,
                                                      int length)
        Deprecated. Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use KeyStoreWrapper.getRSAPublicKey(String, int) instead.
        Generates an RSA keypair and returns the public key.
        Parameters:
        name - Alias of the entry in which the generated key will appear in Android KeyStore.
        length - Key length.
        Returns:
        RSA public key.

      • getRSAPublicString

        public static java.lang.String getRSAPublicString(java.lang.String name,
                                                  int length)
        Deprecated. Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use KeyStoreWrapper.getRSAPublicString(String, int) instead.
        Generates an RSA keypair and returns the encoded public key string.
        Parameters:
        name - Alias of the entry in which the generated key will appear in Android KeyStore.
        length - Key length.
        Returns:
        RSA public key string.

      • getRSAPrivateKey

        public static java.security.PrivateKey getRSAPrivateKey(java.lang.String name,
                                                        int length)
        Deprecated. Will be removed in Mobile SDK 8.0. Use KeyStoreWrapper.getRSAPrivateKey(String, int) instead.
        Generates an RSA keypair and returns the private key.
        Parameters:
        name - Alias of the entry in which the generated key will appear in Android KeyStore.
        length - Key length.
        Returns:
        RSA private key.

      • upgradeTo7Dot1

        public static void upgradeTo7Dot1()
        Upgrades the keys stored in SharedPrefs to encrypted keys. This is a one-time migration step that's run while upgrading to Mobile SDK 7.1.
